items.title: Trump’s ‘Tariff Man’ Stance Isn’t Just Rhetoric - And That’s a Big Market Risk
items.author: Investing.Com
items.description: The article discusses how President Trump's stance on tariffs is not just rhetoric, but a real risk to the market. It analyzes the potential impact of tariffs on government revenues and the broader economy, warning of the dangers of a trade war.

insights.sentiment_reasoning: The article suggests that Trump's love for tariffs and his plan to replace tax revenues with tariffs is dangerous and delusional, posing a significant risk to the market and the broader economy.
The article suggests that Trump's love for tariffs and his plan to replace tax revenues with tariffs is dangerous and delusional, posing a significant risk to the market and the broader economy.

The article notes that Goldman Sachs has cut its real GDP growth projection and lowered its year-end S&P 500 target in response to Trump's tariffs, reflecting the potential negative impact on the economy and markets.
